#summary Where to go to get help.

= Introduction =

OpenEVSE is a community devoloped project and is also supported by the community. There are a lot of resources avaliable and lots of people ready to lend a helping hand or provid advice.

Please use the avaliable resources below before contacting members directly. You will likely get a must faster responce from the community.

=Wiki=
This Wiki provides a lot of usefull information. If something is not clear try asking your question on the OpenEVSE Group. When you get the answer please volinteer to clearify the Wiki for the next builder. Editing Wikis is very easy.

= OpenEVSE Group =
The OpenEVSE group is a great resource to ask questions. It is monotored by all the major contributors of the project and many builders.

https://groups.google.com/forum/?fromgroups#!forum/openevse

= EV specific Forums =
Most EV Forums have a topic dedicated to DIY EVSE or OpenEVSE. These are a good resource for your particular application.
